name: The Prince of Wales's Corporate Leaders Group
goal:
The Prince of Walesâ€™s Corporate Leaders Group is a select group of European business leaders working together under the patronage of His Royal Highness The Prince of Wales to advocate solutions on climate change to policymakers and business peers within the EU and globally.
The CLG seeks to deliver its goal through bringing European business leaders together to advocate for policy change in relation to climate change and a low carbon transition, drawing on high-level convening, thought leadership, business innovation and new partnerships as required.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
The Group is essentially about driving strategic, long-term, transformational change in the economy.The Group is focusing on the changes necessary to ensure long-term economic prosperity, competitive advantage and corporate sustainability at an EU-wide level.
